statements: SELECT * FROM customer_emails;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customer_emails;
SELECT email_address, email_preference FROM customer_emails WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM customer_emails ORDER BY email_address DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_emails;
SELECT * FROM customer_emails WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT email_address FROM customer_emails WHERE email_preference = 'Promotions';
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customer_emails ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_emails WHERE email_preference IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customer_emails WHERE email_preference = 'Updates';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM email_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE campaign_preference = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' ORDER BY last_name DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customers WHERE campaign_preference = TRUE AND last_name LIKE '%son%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com' AND campaign_preference = FALSE;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'Alice' OR last_name = 'Smith' AND campaign_preference = TRUE;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY end_date DESC, campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, email_address, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, count(*) AS total_campaigns FROM campaign_recipients GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, email_address, preferences->>'category' AS category FROM customers WHERE preferences->>'category' = 'shoes'
SELECT c.campaign_name, COUNT(cr.recipient_id) AS total_recipients FROM campaigns c LEFT JOIN campaign_recipients cr ON c.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id GROUP BY c.campaign_name
SELECT p.product_name, p.price, cr.send_date, c.campaign_name FROM products p JOIN campaign_recipients cr ON p.product_id = cr.recipient_id JOIN campaigns c ON cr.campaign_id = c.campaign_id
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%' AND preferences->>'category' IN ('electronics', 'clothing')
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE birthday = '1990-05-15';
SELECT customer_id, email, preferences FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT campaign_id, name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE birthday > '1990-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT cl.log_id, cc.customer_id, ec.name, cl.email_sent FROM email_logs cl INNER JOIN campaign_customers cc ON cl.campaign_id = cc.campaign_id INNER JOIN email_campaigns ec ON cl.campaign_id = ec.campaign_id WHERE cl.email_opened = true;
SELECT cc.customer_id, c.name, c.email FROM customers c INNER JOIN campaign_customers cc ON c.customer_id = cc.customer_id GROUP BY cc.customer_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE subscription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT template_name, creation_date FROM email_templates WHERE template_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE subscription_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT template_name, creation_date FROM email_templates WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT log_id, send_date FROM email_logs WHERE send_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_id ASC
